A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! Rian Johnson brings fresh eyes to the world's most iconic space opera. It's simultaneously easy to digest and enjoy\, while also providing satisfying and intriguing answers to JJ Abrams' mysterious Force Awakens. In true opera-esque fashion\, he brings never-before-seen battles\, fresh drama\, Yoda-approved Jedi spirituality\, and graphical mind-bending visuals.
